resources.string: Lock in after a few seconds.

The instant lock screen is locked by detecting the status of the phone calls, and when the phone is hung, the face is caused by the wrong phone call.. This software is working with a call status monitoring service, and you can set the status of the starting and cleaning up the list..
Call instant lock screen, protect your call inadvertent hang
Instant lock screen without the call
times accumulated when you touch wrongly
Call instant lock screen has helped me to intercept touch operation
